import React, {useState} from 'react' import {useHttp} from '../hooks/http.hook' export const AuthPage = () => { // import myself hook const {loading, error, request} = useHttp() const [form, setForm] = useState( {login:'', password: ''} ) // refreshing form onChange changeFormHandler = (event) => { setForm({...form, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } // send form to backend and get back data const reqisterUserHandler = async () => { try { const data = await request('/register', 'POST', {...form}) console.log('Data:', data) } catch (e) {} // errors already processed in useHttp hook } return (
Authorizathion

Only authenticated users can create and connect to chatrooms.

) }
